backend/main.mo: Actor with access control managing user profiles and a public contact form, storing submissions with timestamps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that returns the provided state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used as reference metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color systems and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with main site routes wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing brand info, navigation links, services list, and contact options including phone link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/CtaBlo: Renders a call‑to‑action block with title, description, and primary/optional secondary CTA links.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqAcc: Displays an accordion-style FAQ list with expandable questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IconBu: Shows a grid of benefits, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PlanCa: Displays a pricing plan card with features, pricing, CTA, and optional popular badge.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proble: Lists common business problems using styled cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Shows a service description card detailing what it is, why it matters, and business impact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Displays testimonials and a case study highlighting business results.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThreeS: Renders a three‑step process section with icons, numbers, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ValueP: Shows a grid of core value cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Whatsa: Provides a styled WhatsApp link button using site configuration.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Exports global site configuration including name, contact info, WhatsApp details, and CTA text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit contact forms through the actor with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Sets up a placeholder for React Query hooks, currently importing useQuery and useActor for future expansion.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and custom utility classes for teal glows and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details, value propositions, and sections highlighting the company’s differentiators.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with state handling and submission via useContactForm, alongside marketing content and WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home page with hero, benefits, pricing previews, and multiple marketing components for lead generation.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows pricing plans with features, an ROI section, and calls to action, using reusable PlanCard and marketing components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with a list of service objects plus marketing components and a hero section layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, existing features, pending feature requests, and metadata for the site’s development tasks.
